text:
Dr.N.G.P. College of Arts and Science will be conducting Brain Beats 2016, a State level quiz competition for school students on February 5. Students from Standard VIII to XII are eligible to participate in teams of two members each. Each school can send any number of teams. Attractive cash prizes will be given for the winners. Entry is free.

The Hindu is the media partner for the event. For registration, contact: 99941 53903, 98940 52915 or email to:ngpbrainbeats@gmail.com
title: Quiz competition
